name: Gnomes & Co: The Art of the Build
name_original: Gnomes & Co: The Art of the Build
description:
Gnomes & Co is a sandbox puzzle game in the style of Zachtronics.

Welcome to the Margins! This is where the gnomes live, those spaces under and behind the facades of the world you know. They make their living assembling machine parts and trinkets for the big folk.

As the newest Director of Operations for Gnomes & Co, your mission is to direct your gnomes to build their products as efficiently as possible. The faster things get built, the more profit we can make!

Although each gnome's move set is simple, every puzzle has a vast array of possible solutions. Compete with other players online to come up with the best designs.
